response.overview: After covering flights to Asia and South America, this time we fly the A340-300 to North America and you're in for a fantastic flight packed with information and great views and ending with a spectacular scenic arrival into San Francisco!  Captain Covolan and his crew will inform you on all the aspects and details of this Transatlantic flight from the crews first arrival at the Swiss Operations Desk to the shutdown in Zurich after the return flight. Enjoy this great opportunity of flying Swiss International!
response.title: Swiss A340 San Francisco
